Text: Artist (film):  An adaptation of "Dreams In Prussian Blue", a paperback novel by Paritosh Uttam, the film is about two fine arts students, both driven by individual ambitions, who decide to live together.

Text: Artist (film):  The film traces the course of their relationship and their progression as artists.
